mapper.select: select AA.USER_ID as userId, USER_PWD as userPwd, USER_NM as userNm from USER as AA where AA.USER_ID = #{id}

select A.USER_ID as userId ,USER_NM as userNm ,B.COUPLE_ID as coupleId,COUPLE_YN as coupleYn from USER AS A left outer join `COUPLE` AS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID=#{id} AND B.COUPLE_YN='N' union all select A.USER_ID as userId ,USER_NM as userNm ,B.COUPLE_ID as coupleId,COUPLE_YN as coupleYn from USER AS A left outer join `COUPLE` AS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID=#{id} and COUPLE_ID is null;

SELECT REQ_FROM as userId, BB.USER_NM as userNm,COUPLE_YN as coupleYn FROM REQ_COUPLE AA JOIN USER BB ON BB.USER_ID = AA.REQ_FROM LEFT OUTER JOIN COUPLE CC ON AA.REQ_FROM = CC.USER_ID AND CC.COUPLE_YN = 'N' WHERE AA.REQ_TO=#{id};
select USER_ID as userId, ROLE_ID as roleId,ROLE_NM as roleNm from ROLES where USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into USER (user_id, user_pwd, user_nm) values (, #{userPwd}, #{userNm})
insert into REQ_COUPLE ( REQ_FROM, REQ_TO, REQ_STATE,REG_USER, EDIT_USER) values (#{userId},#{coupleId},'003','system','system')
